steps.1: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup
steps.2: Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
steps.3: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray
steps.4: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
steps.5: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
steps.6: Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
steps.7: replace -replace the top of the English muffin
steps.8: Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
steps.9: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
steps.10: Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
steps.11: stir-stir the ramekin cup
steps.12: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife

steps.1: Peel-Peel 1 garlic clove
steps.2: Pour-Pour the sauces over the meatballs
steps.3: Cut-Cut 1/8 garlic clove
steps.4: Peel-Peel one medium onion
steps.5: Stir-Stir the contents in the microwave with a spoon
steps.6: Slice-Slice 1/8 medium onion
steps.7: Stir-Stir the contents in the microwave with a spoon
steps.8: Microwave-Microwave the plate, covered, on high for 1.5 minutes
steps.9: Place-Place 5 meatballs in a Microwave-safe plate
steps.10: Cut-Cut 1/4 medium carrot into short, thin strips
steps.11: Mix-Mix 1/4 cup sweet-and-sour sauce and 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce in a small bowl
steps.12: Top-Top the plate with the carrots, onion, garlic and 1/4 tsp pepper powder
steps.13: Microwave-Microwave the plate, covered, on high for 1.5 minutes

steps.1: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of salt and add it to the mug
steps.2: Sprinkle-Sprinkle dried Italian herbs inside the mug
steps.3: Take-Take 1 tablespoon of marinara sauce
steps.4: spread-spread marinara sauce around the surface of the batter
steps.5: Microwave-Microwave for 1 minute 20 seconds, or until it rises and the toppings are bubbling
steps.6: add-Measure 4 tablespoons of flour and add it to the mug
steps.7: Add-1 tablespoon of olive oil to the mug
steps.8: add-Measure 1/16 teaspoon of baking soda and add it to the mug
steps.9: Take-Take a microwavable mug
steps.10: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug thoroughly. (There might be some lumps, but that is ok.)
steps.11: Stir-Stir the contents in the mug well
steps.12: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 generous tablespoon of mozzarella cheese on top of the sauce
steps.13: add-Measure 1/8 teaspoon of baking powder and add it to the mug
steps.14: Add-Add in 3 tablespoons of milk to the mug

steps.1: Mix-Mix in the flavour packet to the bowl
steps.2: Stir-Stir noodles with a spoon or fork until the flavouring dissolves
steps.3: Remove-Remove the noodles from the package(Break Noodles / Keep them as a block)
steps.4: Microwave-Microwave the ramen for 4 minutes
steps.5: slice-slice 1/4 medium onion into pieces
steps.6: Peel-Peel 1 medium onion
steps.7: Let-Let the noodles sit for about 1 minute after the microwave stops
steps.8: Cover-Cover with a lid (or paper towel) to prevent splattering
steps.9: Add-Add basil to the bowl
steps.10: Chop-Chop 1 garlic clove on a cutting board
steps.11: Add-Add the noodles to the bowl
steps.12: Add-Add chopped cilantro to the bowl
steps.13: Put-Put all the Vegetables in a microwave-safe bowl

steps.1: Wait-Wait about 30 seconds for the coffee to bloom. (You will see small bubbles or foam on the coffee grounds during this step.)
steps.2: Pour-Pour a small amount of water into the filter to wet the grounds
steps.3: Transfer-Transfer the grounds to the filter cone
steps.4: spread-spread open filter in dripper to create a cone
steps.5: Place-Place the paper filter in the dripper
steps.6: pour-Slowly pour the rest of the water over the grounds in a circular motion. Do not overfill beyond the top of the paper filter
steps.7: Prepare-Prepare the filter insert by folding the paper filter in half to create a semi-circle, and in half again to create a quarter-circle
steps.8: Discard-Discard the paper filter and coffee grounds
steps.9: Boil-Boil the water. (While the water is boiling, assemble the filter cone)
steps.10: Weigh-Weigh the coffee beans (0.8oz-0.12 oz)
steps.11: drain-Let the coffee drain completely into the mug before removing the dripper
steps.12: Grind-Grind the coffee beans until the coffee grounds are the consistency of coarse sand, about 20 seconds
steps.14: Place-Place the dripper on top of a coffee mug
steps.16: check-Once the water has boiled, check the temperature of the water. (The water should be between 195-205 degrees Fahrenheit or between 91-96 degrees Celsius. If the water is too hot, let it cool briefly.)

steps.1: Whisk-Whisk the egg
steps.2: Microwave-Microwave for 3 minutes, stirring in between
steps.3: Add-Add 1/2 tbsp sweet and sour sauce to the bowl
steps.4: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1 tbsp shredded cheddar cheese on top of the egg
steps.5: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
steps.6: add-Extract and add contents of an egg to a microwave-safe bowl
steps.7: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to another into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.8: Pour-Pour egg mixture on top of the tortilla
steps.9: Add-Add 1 tbsp salsa to the bowl
steps.10: Place-Place 8 inch tortilla on a cutting board
steps.11: Sprinkle-Sprinkle oregano in the bowl
steps.12: END

steps.1: Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve
steps.2: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug
steps.3: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug
steps.5: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug
steps.6: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk
steps.7: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute
steps.8: Add-Add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug
steps.9: END

steps.1: Microwave-Microwave on high for 90 seconds until the egg is cooked through
steps.3: add-add bread pieces to the egg mixture in the mug, pressing the bread down into the egg
steps.4: stir-stir the mug
steps.5: melt-In a large mug, melt 1 tablespoon of softened butter in the microwave for about 30 seconds
steps.6: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon over the egg
steps.7: cut-cut the contents on plate, and serve
steps.8: Put-Put the mug's contents on a plate
steps.9: Roll-Roll the butter around in the mug to coat it
steps.10: Cut or tear-Cut or tear 1 slices of bread into bite-size pieces
steps.11: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract to the mug
steps.12: whisk-In the mug, whisk one egg with a fork until well blended

steps.1: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
steps.2: Discard-Discard ends of the tortilla
steps.3: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
steps.4: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping with a paper towel
steps.5: Cross-Cross the floss's two ends over the tortilla roll's top
steps.6: Slide-Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll
steps.7: Spread-Spread jelly over the nut butter
steps.8: pull-pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice
steps.9: Place-Place the pinwheels on a plate
steps.10: Secure-Secure the rolled tortilla by inserting 5 toothpicks about 1 inch apart
steps.11: scoop-Use the knife to scoop jelly from the jar
steps.12: Spread-Spread nut butter onto the tortilla, leaving 1/2-inch uncovered at the edges
steps.13: scoop-Use a butter knife to scoop nut butter from the jar
steps.14: slicing-Continue slicing with floss to create 1 more pinwheel
steps.15: Trim-Trim the ends of the tortilla roll with the butter knife, leaving 1/2 inch margin between the last toothpick and the end of the roll
steps.16: Place-Place 8-inch flour tortilla on cutting board
steps.17: Roll-Roll the tortilla from one end to the other into a log shape, about 1.5 inches thick. Roll it tight enough to prevent gaps, but not so tight that the filling leaks
steps.18: Place-Place the floss halfway between toothpicks
steps.19: Clean-Clean the knife by wiping it with a paper towel

steps.1: Slice-Slice one tomato into about 1/2 inch thick slices
steps.2: Place-Place the thick slices of tomatoes on a platter, ensuring they only make a single layer
steps.3: Add-Add a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, about 1 tablespoon, over the entire platter
steps.4: dry-gently dry it with a paper/tea towel
steps.5: Season-Season the tomato slices with salt
steps.6: Sprinkle-Sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the tomato throughout the platter
steps.7: Rinse-Rinse a tomato
steps.8: Season-Season platter with 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
steps.9: Garnish-Garnish platter with italian seasoning
steps.10: END

steps.1: add-add lime juice to the bowl
steps.2: Measure-Measure 2 cups of frozen corn
steps.3: Add-1 teaspoon of pepper powder to the bowl
steps.4: Extract-Extract lime juice from 1/3 lime
steps.6: Add-Add the corn into a microwave-safe bowl
steps.7: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl well
steps.8: Microwave-Microwave the corn for 2 minutes
steps.9: Microwave-Microwave the corn for 3 more minutes
steps.10: stir-then stir the bowl
steps.11: Add-Add 1 teaspoon salt to the bowl
steps.12: Thaw-Thaw the frozen corn by putting it in a sieve and running it under cold water

steps.1: Add-Add 1/4 tsp mustard to the pan
steps.2: mince-mince the garlic
steps.3: Add-1/2 tsp cumin seeds to the pan
steps.4: Add-Add tomato puree to the pan
steps.5: Take-Take the pan off the heat
steps.6: Mix-Mix well tomato puree with contents in the pan
steps.7: Peel-Peel 4 large garlic cloves
steps.8: Add-1/2 tsp salt to the pan
steps.9: Add-Add 2 tbsp red chili powder to the pan
steps.10: Saute-Saute the garlic for 2-3 minutes
steps.11: Take-Take 1 tomato
steps.12: puree-puree tomatoes without any water in a blender/mixer
steps.14: add-When mustard and cumin seeds begin to sizzle, add minced garlic
steps.15: simmer-Allow the mixture to simmer over low heat for 5 minutes or until the mixture becomes thick
steps.16: Heat-Heat 3 tbsp oil in a pan over medium heat
steps.17: Chop-Chop tomato roughly (anysize chunks are fine)
steps.18: Transfer-Transfer it to a serving bowl
steps.19: mix-mix well contents of the pan

steps.1: Chop-Chop 1 tsp cilantro
steps.2: Whisk-Whisk the egg mixture in the bowl
steps.3: Add-Add garlic to the pan
steps.4: Chop-Chop 1 green chilli
steps.5: Add-Add chilli to the pan
steps.6: Chop-Chop 1/4 medium onion
steps.7: add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the bowl
steps.8: Cook-Cook for 1 minute, mixing everything
steps.9: Saute-Saute the onions on medium heat until they are soft and translucent
steps.10: Crack-Crack one egg in the bowl
steps.11: Add-Add 1/8 tsp of turmeric to the pan
steps.12: Chop-Chop 1/4 tomato
steps.13: Cook-Cook covered for 1 minute or until the tomatoes soften
steps.14: mixing-Keep mixing with a spatula for 3 minutes or until the eggs are almost cooked
steps.15: pour-Slowly pour the whisked eggs into the pan
steps.16: Heat-Heat 2 tbsp oil in a heavy-bottomed or nonstick pan on medium heat
steps.17: Garnish-Garnish with 1 tbsp chopped cilantro and serve
steps.20: add-add 1 tbsp milk to the bowl
steps.21: add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the pan
steps.22: add-add chopped onions to the pan

steps.1: Add-1/4 teaspoon of red chilli powder to the bowl
steps.2: peel-peel the cucumber
steps.3: whisk-In a mixing bowl, whisk 1 cup of chilled curd until smooth. Use fresh homemade or packaged curd
steps.4: Add-1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
steps.5: chop or grate-chop or grate the cucumber
steps.6: Combine-Combine all the ingredients in the bowl
steps.7: add-add 1 tablespoon of chopped cilantro leaves to the bowl
steps.8: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of cumin powder to the bowl
steps.9: Rinse-Rinse 1 medium sized cucumber
steps.10: Add-Add the chopped or grated cucumber to the whisked curd
steps.11: Add-1/2 teaspoon of chaat masala powder to the bowl
steps.12: END

steps.1: Cook-Cook for 2 minutes or until the zoodles are done
steps.2: Add-1/6 cup grated parmesan cheese
steps.3: season-pepper to taste
steps.4: Top-Top with more parmesan if desired
steps.5: Heat-Heat a large pan on medium heat
steps.6: Remove-Remove from heat
steps.7: season-season with salt
steps.8: Add-Add 1 large minced garlic cloves to the pan
steps.9: Peel-Peel 1 garlic cloves
steps.10: Add-Add the zucchini noodles
steps.11: Cook-Cook garlic until fragrant (about 1 minutes). Be careful not to burn garlic
steps.12: Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer

steps.1: pat-pat rinsed mushrooms dry with a paper towel
steps.2: Rinse-Rinse 3 mushrooms under cold water
steps.3: cook-cook the pan, often stirring, for 1 minute
steps.4: add-Once the pan is hot, add the mushrooms
steps.5: Add-Add chopped shallot to the pan
steps.6: Slice-Slice the mushrooms
steps.7: mince-mince garlic cloves
steps.8: Chop-Chop 1 shallot
steps.9: cook-cook for 3-5 minutes, stirring often, until mushrooms start to soften and brown
steps.10: Pull-Pull out mushroom stems
steps.11: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
steps.12: Transfer-Transfer the contents of the pan to a serving dish
steps.13: cook-cook the pan, often stirring, for 1 minute
steps.15: Add-1/4 tbsp balsamic vinegar to the pan
steps.16: Add-Add 2 cloves of minced garlic to the pan

steps.1: Add-1/2 tsp baking powder to a blender
steps.2: Serve-Serve the pancakes with chopped strawberries
steps.3: Melt-Melt a small knob of butter in a non-stick frying pan over low-medium heat
steps.4: splash-splash maple syrup on plate
steps.5: Add-Add 1 banana to a blender
steps.6: Cook-Cook for 1 min or until the tops start to bubble
steps.7: blitz-blitz the blender for 20 seconds
steps.8: Flip-Flip the pancakes with a fork or a fish slice spatula
steps.9: Add-1 egg to a blender
steps.10: cook-cook for 20-30 seconds more
steps.11: Pour-Pour three little puddles straight from the blender into the frying pan
steps.12: Add-1 heaped tbsp flour to a blender

steps.1: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a non-stick frying pan
steps.2: put-put tomatoes on a serving plate
steps.3: Chop-Chop 2 tbsp cilantro
steps.4: stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space
steps.5: crack-crack one egg in a bowl
steps.6: cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour
steps.7: Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan
steps.8: add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl
steps.9: Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes
steps.10: Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan
steps.11: Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette
steps.12: Cut-Cut tomato into two pieces
steps.14: Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl
steps.15: add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl

steps.1: Add-Add 1/8 cup soy sauce to the bowl
steps.2: Set-Set aside the sauce mixture
steps.3: Add-Add 1 tablespoon honey to the bowl
steps.4: cook-cook, stirring often, for 4 minutes. If the pan gets too hot on medium-high, turn the heat down to medium
steps.5: Add-Add 1 teaspoon cornstarch to the bowl
steps.6: Add-Add 2 cloves minced garlic to the bowl
steps.7: Pour-Pour the sauce into the skillet
steps.8: Peel-Peel 2 cloves of garlic
steps.9: Add-add sliced mushrooms to the skillet
steps.10: slice-slice mushrooms
steps.11: Whisk-Whisk the contents of bowl
steps.12: Add-Add bell pepper to the skillet
steps.15: cook-cook, stirring, for 1 minute until the sauce thickens
steps.17: Heat-Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
steps.18: Add-Add 1/2 tablespoon minced ginger to the bowl
steps.19: Add-Add 1/8 teaspoon black pepper to the bowl
steps.23: Whisk-Whisk the sauce again to recombine the ingredients
steps.25: continue cooking-continue cooking, stirring often, for 2-3 minutes, until vegetables are crisp-tender

steps.1: Cut-Cut 1/4 block or 3 ounces of fresh tofu into large cubes (about 1 in x 1 in)
steps.2: Turn-Turn on the heat to medium
steps.3: drizzle-drizzle 1 tablespoon soy sauce (watch for spitting) on the pan
steps.4: drizzle-drizzle with the 1 tablespoons sesame oil on the pan
steps.5: add-add the tofu cubes to the pan
steps.6: remove-Briefly remove the pan from the heat to reduce spitting
steps.7: flip-flip tofu on the pan
steps.8: remove-Briefly remove from the heat again
steps.9: Transfer-Transfer to a serving dish
steps.10: Return-Return to low heat
steps.11: Flip-Flip the tofu with tongs
steps.12: add-add 1/4 tsp salt to the pan
steps.14: cook-cook pan for 2 minutes until the colour is darkened
steps.17: Add-Add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to a non-stick pan
steps.18: Cook-Cook 5 to 6 minutes until tofu cubes are lightly browned on the bottom
steps.19: pat-pat tofu dry with a towel

steps.1: Whisk-Whisk batter until no lumps remain
steps.2: remove-then carefully remove the paper liner
steps.3: Measure and add-2 tbsp water to the bowl
steps.4: Measure and add-1.5 tbsp sugar to the mixing bowl
steps.5: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 4 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a zip-top bag
steps.6: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl
steps.7: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp vegetable oil to the bowl
steps.8: Set-Set aside the lined mug
steps.9: Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake
steps.10: Place-Place the paper cupcake liner inside the mug
steps.11: Measure and add-1/4 tsp baking powder to the bowl
steps.12: Allow-Allow to cool until it is no longer hot to the touch
steps.13: cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter
steps.15: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl
steps.16: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate
steps.17: Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl
steps.18: seal-seal zip top bag, removing as much air as possible
steps.19: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 60 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue
steps.20: Measure and add-1/4 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl

steps.1: add-add 1/2 tbsp softened butter to the bowl
steps.2: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
steps.3: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup
steps.4: Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl
steps.5: Microwave-Microwave the bowl, covered, for 2 minutes
steps.6: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper to the bowl
steps.7: Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl
steps.8: Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into tiny bits
steps.9: Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl
steps.10: Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 30 sec. (Check after 30 seconds and microwave for 10 seconds more if needed)
steps.11: Mix-Mix all the ingredients of the bowl well
steps.12: END

steps.1: place-place avocado slices on each leaf
steps.2: Season-season 1/4 tsp pepper on the bowl
steps.3: Add-1/4 cup mayonnaise to the bowl
steps.4: drain-drain excess water from can
steps.5: Lay-Lay out 2 large lettuce leaves
steps.6: Roll-Roll up the lettuce wraps
steps.7: Mix-Mix the contents of the bowl
steps.8: top-top lettuce leaves with the tuna mixture
steps.9: Add-add chopped scallion to the bowl
steps.10: Add-Add 1 can drained tuna to the bowl
steps.11: Take-Take 1 ripe avocado
steps.12: Open-Open a can of tuna
steps.13: secure-secure the wrap with a toothpick
steps.15: Add-1 tsp Sriracha sauce to the bowl

steps.1: add-1/8 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl
steps.2: add-1/4 tsp salt to a bowl
steps.3: Slice-Slice two 1/2 inch thick rounds from a baguette (slice slanted)
steps.4: Spoon-Spoon the mixture from the bowl onto the bread
steps.5: add-1/4 tsp pepper to a bowl
steps.6: add-1/16 cup basil to a bowl
steps.7: Combine-Combine the contents of the bowl
steps.8: Brush-Brush 2 slices of baguette with olive oil on both sides
steps.9: Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into halves
steps.10: add-In a bowl, add the cut cherry tomatoes
steps.11: Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate
steps.12: END
